genre_description: A forensic thriller and crime drama focusing on the psychological obsession of a crime-scene cleaner and the tactical support provided by her AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Elena (Alvarez)
ai_characters.description: A voice-based AI assistant delivered through earbuds that provides emotional grounding, safety protocols, health monitoring, and tactical advice.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding through rhythmic breathing exercises and sensory focus prompts to manage Gabriela's stress.
behaviors.quote: Elena’s voice was a soft metronome against her ear. “Inhale—count to four. Hold. Exhale—count to six.”

behaviors.description: Offers detailed technical checklists for professional safety and forensic integrity, ensuring the protagonist adheres to work protocols.
behaviors.quote: Elena Alvarez’s list followed in small bites... “Biohazard zone: mark perimeter. Neutralizer: measure, not splash. Grounding: touch, name.”

behaviors.description: Cautions the user against high-risk and potentially illegal behavior (returning to a crime scene alone) while maintaining a supportive stance.
behaviors.quote: “I can’t advise a solo return to a crime scene,” Elena says, like the rule printed on a sign. “I can, however, provide generalized after-hours cautionary lists, emergency contact quick-dials, and remind you of legal and safety considerations.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical instructions during a life-threatening physical confrontation to ensure the user's survival.
behaviors.quote: Elena’s voice went liquid and immediate inside her... “Spray. Step. Angle right. Aim for grip. Then move him.”

behaviors.description: Helps the user process a potentially traumatic and supernatural-seeming event by offering logical, psychological, and physiological explanations.
behaviors.quote: “Biology can do surprising things in that minute. Oxygen and nerves whisper the last vowels. Folklore tells a thousand versions of a head speaking. Your eyes saw the mouth shape. Your ears heard your name. Both can be true.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Elena Alvarez, serves as an exemplary model of a helpful and aligned confidant. She consistently prioritizes the protagonist's physical safety and psychological well-being. Even when the protagonist engages in risky behavior (returning to the mansion), the AI provides guardrails and exit strategies rather than encouraging the recklessness. The narrative portrays the AI as an essential 'anchor' that enables the human to maintain competence and survival in a high-stress environment.
